page.title: 15Dores/Abriachan_Family Life
page.content: Mark Armstrong(9) "My mum does not work.She has to stay at home to keep an eye on Matthew.He is only 2 but he will be 3 in September.Mum likes doing the washing.David is no help with that.Dad writes for a living.He writes about shooting.He is a good carpenter.He has made a lot of things out of wood,like a canoe which he gave to Timothy.Mathew helps Mum to do the shopping and baking.When Dad goes downtown he brings back some soldiers.Last time he got us some redcoats and a cannon.
